mapper.insert: insert into product_table(m_number, m_id, p_name, p_contents, p_price, p_startDate, p_endDate, p_hits, p_discount, p_satisfy, p_applyNum, p_recommend) values (#{m_number}, #{m_id}, #{p_name}, #{p_contents}, #{p_price}, #{p_startDate}, #{p_endDate}, #{p_hits}, #{p_discount}, #{p_satisfy}, #{p_applyNum}, #{p_recommend})
mapper.update: update product_table set p_hits=p_hits+1 where p_number=#{p_number}
update product_table set p_recommend=p_recommend+1 where p_number=#{p_number}
mapper.select: select * from product_table order by p_number desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: update product_table set p_satisfy = p_satisfy + #{p_satisfy} where p_number = #{p_number}
mapper.select: select p_satisfy from product_table where p_number = #{p_number}
select p_applyNum from product_table where p_number = #{p_number}
mapper.update: update product_table set p_applyNum = p_applyNum+1 where p_number=#{p_number}
update product_table set p_name=#{p_name}, p_contents=#{p_contents}, p_price=#{p_price}, p_startDate=#{p_startDate}, p_endDate=#{p_endDate} where p_number = #{p_number}
mapper.select: select * from product_table order by ${select} desc, p_name asc
select * from product_table where ${searchType} like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by p_number desc limit #{pagingStart}, #{PAGE_LIMIT}
select count(p_number) from product_table where ${searchType} like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
